医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明，社交媒体的使用不会以同样的方式影响所有青少年一项新的研究探讨了青春期和成年早期早期社交媒体使用与抑郁症之间的关系，发现某些因素可能会使社交媒体对抑郁症更具风险或保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Social-media-use-does-not-impact-all-adolescents-in-the-same-way-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Social-media-use-does-not-impact-all-adolescents-in-the-same-way-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2facf2e4-7cfa-42b8-8f46-4bf836cc6f19 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 13:34:15 -0400 Social media use does not impact all adolescents in the same way, study suggests
审查发现严格限制盐对心力衰竭患者没有临床益处几十年来，人们一直认为患有心力衰竭的人应该大幅减少饮食中盐的摄入量，但一些研究表明限制盐可能对这些患者有害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Review-finds-no-proven-clinical-benefit-to-strict-salt-restriction-for-病人-with-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Review-finds-no-proven-clinical-benefit-to-strict-salt-restriction-for-病人-with-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a07da70-a511-4120-b60c-737f18243fe8 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 13:30:05 -0400 Review finds no proven clinical benefit to strict salt restriction for patients with heart failure
专家发布指南，帮助安全、公平地实施 Palforzia 花生口服免疫疗法根据花生过敏儿童和青少年的焦点小组，专家为英国国家医疗服务体系 (NHS) 的临床医生发布了指南，帮助他们安全、公平地实施 Palforzia® 花生口服免疫疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Experts-publish-guidance-to-help-safely-and-equitically-implement-Palforzia-peanut-oral-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Experts-publish-guidance-to-help-safely-and-equitically-implement-Palforzia-peanut-oral-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c715dcce-751d-485d-92b7-033116c62e7b Wed, 26 Jun 2024 13:25:00 -0400 Experts publish guidance to help safely and equitably implement Palforzia peanut oral immunotherapy
新工具预测热浪和寒潮带来的健康风险全球每年有超过 500 万人因环境温度过早死亡，其中仅西欧就超过 30 万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/New-tool-predicts-health-risks-from-heat-and-cold-waves.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/New-tool-predicts-health-risks-from-heat-and-cold-waves.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59839de7-23af-4088-a311-e9efd0d2501e Wed, 26 Jun 2024 13:16:03 -0400 New tool predicts health risks from heat and cold waves
美国法官裁定加州藐视监狱心理健康人员配置一名联邦法官认定加州监狱高级官员存在民事藐视法庭罪，因为他们未能聘请足够的心理健康专业人员来充分治疗数万名患有严重精神障碍的囚犯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/US-judge-finds-California-in-contempt-over-prison-mental-health-staffing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/US-judge-finds-California-in-contempt-over-prison-mental-health-staffing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b35f611-ce1b-4e0a-8bbb-d61777b1a69a Wed, 26 Jun 2024 13:06:33 -0400 US judge finds California in contempt over prison mental health staffing
无袖监测仪为高血压管理带来希望布里格姆研究人员领导的一项研究评估了一种新型设备，该设备可以自动测量手腕血压，在几天内生成数百个读数，可以帮助临床医生确定心血管风险并改善高血压护理https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Cuffless-monitor-offers-promise-for-hypertension-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Cuffless-monitor-offers-promise-for-hypertension-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80b08ed7-5e30-4168-a1a4-ced08b1562be Wed, 26 Jun 2024 10:49:30 -0400 Cuffless monitor offers promise for hypertension management
CSF1R 标记物可用于巨噬细胞激活嵌合体的研究巨噬细胞通过抵抗感染和帮助组织修复在免疫系统中发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/CSF1R-marker-enables-study-of-Macrophage-Activation-Mosaicism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/CSF1R-marker-enables-study-of-Macrophage-Activation-Mosaicism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d350feb9-76b8-4c26-88bc-f4f4c235e76c Wed, 26 Jun 2024 10:32:08 -0400 CSF1R marker enables study of Macrophage Activation Mosaicism
最近的研究发现降血糖药物对痴呆风险的有效性存在差异研究人员比较了抗糖尿病药物在降低老年糖尿病患者患痴呆症风险方面的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Differences-in-effectness-among-antihyperglycemic-drugs-on-dementia-risk-identified-in-recent-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Differences-in-effectness-among-antihyperglycemic-drugs-on-dementia-risk-identified-in-recent-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=164cc85d-8da9-4c5c-9b64-74093dcf1a52 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 10:30:00 -0400 Differences in effectiveness among antihyperglycemic drugs on dementia risk identified in recent study
Scale Biosciences 宣布推出 ScalePlex 技术，以简化任何规模的单细胞基因组学研究新颖的多重技术可实现无缝样品池，从而促进用于化合物筛选和转化研究的经济高效的单细胞实验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Scale-Biosciences-announces-ScalePlex-technology-to-simplify-single-cell-genomics-studies-of-any-scale.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Scale-Biosciences-announces-ScalePlex-technology-to-simplify-single-cell-genomics-studies-of-any-scale.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcc71e7c-6166-4063-94f6-329eb88d2e45 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 10:16:00 -0400 Scale Biosciences announces ScalePlex technology to simplify single cell genomics studies of any scale
研究人员发现阿尔茨海默病血脑屏障功能障碍的分子特征血脑屏障 -;血管和组织网络，滋养大脑并保护大脑免受血液中循环的有害物质的影响；在阿尔茨海默病中被破坏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Researchers-uncover-molecular-signatures-of-blood-brain-barrier-dysfunction-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Researchers-uncover-molecular-signatures-of-blood-brain-barrier-dysfunction-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0075171b-d83a-4b98-8608-a9b276d453a1 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 10:10:37 -0400 Researchers uncover molecular signatures of blood-brain barrier dysfunction in Alzheimer's disease
